question: 即日
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>instant</kanji> <kanji>day</kanji> is the day that's going on this instant. It's the <vocabulary>same day</vocabulary> as now.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading for <ja>即</ja> is the normal one. For <ja>日</ja> you're going to want to use the <ja>じつ</ja> reading, because, the <reading>truth</reading> (<ja>じつ</ja>) is that it's the same day today.
